zh: 除了期待天空一直不會下雨，你還可以學會在雨天跳舞。
en: Instead of wishing for the sky to never rain, you can learn to dance in the rain.

zh: 人生所有的點都是連結在一起的。
en: Every point in life is connected.
Look forward — let bygones be bygones.

zh: 每件事情發生都有它的原因。
en: Everything that happens has its own meaning.

zh: 時間是人際關係的衡量標準之一。
en: Time is one of the standards by which relationships are measured.
